data.prayer: Spirit, help the people of the the county of Vendée to be consumed with longing for your Word at all times, like David.
data.verse: My soul is consumed with longing for your laws at all times.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Vendée, Pays de la Loire, France
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself known to the 645,800 people living in Vendée through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in Vendée who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, help your children in Vendée, Pays de la Loire, France find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Les Herbiers
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Les Herbiers, Pays de la Loire, France.
Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the county of Vendée.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Vendée, Pays de la Loire, France not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.focus_label: Vendée, Pays de la Loire, France
data.section_summary:
the county of Vendée, Pays de la Loire, France has a population of 645,800.

We estimate Vendée has 7,935 people who might know Jesus, 394,920 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 242,945 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 81 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Vendée, Pays de la Loire, France into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.
